title: Lemon Herb Grilled Chicken
summary: A light and zesty grilled chicken marinated in a mix of lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, and fresh herbs. Perfect for a healthy and flavorful dinner
instructions: Marinate the chicken with lemon, olive oil, and herbs for 30 minutes.
Grill the chicken over medium heat until cooked through.
Serve with a side of vegetables.

title: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
summary: A quick and easy pasta dish made with sautéed mushrooms, garlic, and a creamy Parmesan sauce. Comfort food that’s both rich and satisfying.
instructions: Boil the pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté mushrooms in butter until golden.
Add heavy cream and Parmesan, then combine with pasta.

title: Avocado Toast with Poached Eggs
summary: A simple yet delicious breakfast or snack featuring creamy mashed avocado on toasted sourdough, topped with perfectly poached eggs and a sprinkle of chili flakes.
